command.description: Create an intermediate passphrase token for deferred encrypted key generation (BIP38).

option.name: lot
option.description: An arbitrary lot number, limited to 1048575.

option.name: sequence
option.description: An arbitrary sequence number, limited to 4095.

argument.name: PASSPHRASE
argument.description: The passphrase for encrypting the token.

argument.name: SALT
argument.description: The Base16 entropy for the new token. Must be at least 32 bits in length. Only the first 32 bits are used unless lot and sequence are zero or unspecified and the salt is at least 64 bits, in which case 64 bits are used and lot and sequence are not used. If not specified the salt is read from STDIN.

define.value: The salt is less than 32 bits long.

command.description: Decode a Base16 transaction.

option.name: format

command.description: Encode an unsigned transaction as Base16.

option.name: script_version
option.description: The pay-to-script-hash payment address version, defaults to 5. This is used to differentiate output addresses.

option.name: lock_time
option.description: The transaction lock time.

option.name: version
option.description: The transaction version, defaults to 1.

option.name: input
option.description: The set of transaction input points encoded as TXHASH:INDEX:SEQUENCE. TXHASH is a Base16 transaction hash. INDEX is the 32 bit input index in the context of the transaction. SEQUENCE is the optional 32 bit input sequence and defaults to the maximum value.

option.name: output
option.description: The set of transaction output data encoded as TARGET:SATOSHI:SEED. TARGET is an address (including stealth or pay-to-script-hash) or a Base16 script. SATOSHI is the 64 bit spend amount in satoshi. SEED is required for stealth outputs and not used otherwise. The same seed should NOT be used for multiple outputs.

define.name: BX_TX_ENCODE_INVALID_OUTPUT
define.value: An output is not valid.

define.name: BX_TX_ENCODE_LOCKTIME_CONFLICT
define.value: The specified lock time is ineffective because all sequences are set to the maximum value.
